name: Grab the Mask
description:
This is a mode of operation similar to the bomber game, the purpose of the game is to seize more territory and blow up each other.
Players can only move on their own colored floor and can use bombs to expand their range of activities.
Gain all kinds of props to enhance their ability, and further squeeze each other's living space.
A mask is a special prop that can move around without the color of the floor and occupy each other's territory.
Those who blow up each other or grab more chassis win.

Game features:
* this is a multiplayer game similar to a bomber. Two players use the same PC to fight.
* Random terrain can produce rich game effects, and each game gives players a different experience.
* 5 kinds of ordinary props are available for capacity growth, one of which is a special prop (mask) to help players turn the tide of the war.

Mode of operation:
1P : move:WASD fire:left Shift
2P : move: ↑←↓→ fire:right Shift
